title: Mobile Microlearning Program for Information Literacy Competency Strengthening

context.additional_context: Short-term intensive education conducted in a BYOD environment, focusing on cultivating information retrieval/evaluation skills to address social studies research topics

learning_goals: Learners can identify credible sources related to social science topics in academic databases using three or more search strategies.
Learners can select materials by applying five criteria for assessing the reliability of diverse information sources.
Learners can accurately cite retrieved sources according to APA Style guidelines.

resources: Digital Resource Access Permissions for Libraries

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
